conversation.text: For a buddy movie vibe, I recommend "Men in Black" (1997). It features a fun team of agents played by Tommy Lee Jones and Will Smith, who team up to protect the world from extraterrestrial threats while keeping their identities secret.

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: I would recommend 'Man on Wire' (2008). The movie tells the fascinating story of Philippe Petit, a tightrope walker who illegally performed a high-wire walk between New York City's World Trade Center towers in 1974. Starring Jean-Louis Blondeau, Paul McGill, and the real-life subject himself, Philippe Petit, it's an insightful and captivating film.
